```{r}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
```

需求是在 [github](https://github.com/JiaxiangBU/learn_git/blob/master/conda/command-not-found-error.md)

```{r}
"CommandNotFoundError" %>% 
    str_replace_all('([:lower:])([:Upper:])','\\1-\\2') %>% 
    str_to_lower()
```
